entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 06:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 58 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 06:24 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:24 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
